website_summaries.verdict: Unbeatable when it comes to blackhead removal, and easily washes off.
pros: Very strong and excellent at cleaning out pores
Good for those with blackheads and signs of aging
cons: Doesn't have a particularly pleasant or noticeable scent

customer_reviews.title: Dry/Sensitive Skin People - BE CAREFUL!
customer_reviews.text: 1st picture is with flash, the 2nd without. SO. I have mixed feelings about this product. My face is normally not red. The pictures are just to show the irritation and burning sensation I currently have all over my face. Essentially, if your face is dry and/or sensitive, DON'T use it as a full mask. Rather, just for problem areas. The mask itself was somewhat difficult to work with. You would *literally* need to make this mask thick as thieves, otherwise it's painful & difficult to take off. Honestly, my face hurts & I can't even tell if it removed any black heads, so I don't know what to think of this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Gave me acne and hurt like a b*tch
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and was so excited to try this mask. Starting to think those people were paid to review so highly. It removed SOME black heads still had plenty left. It hurt so bad ripping that thing off my face, I was almost in tears. Then the next day I started getting acne like crazy. I never got acne like that before my face was covered. I was disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do a think besides stick to my face. Incredibly painful to pull off. My face was red for days. Pulled NOTHING out of my pours.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D. White

customer_reviews.title: Painful... proceed with caution!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to write a review since I feel like the other reviews must have been written by women with no facial hair or feeling in their face. This did an ok job on my forehead and noise, but was terrible to get off my cheeks and chin. The reason your pores look smaller is because your face swells from ripping this tar off your skin. Proceed with caution!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Beauty is Pain
customer_reviews.text: Most painful peel I've ever experienced. Can't believe I still have skin left on my face. Having said that, the remaining single layer of my epidermis looks fresh and feels quite rejuvenated. Gotta give it 4 stars because it definitely does the job. BUT AT WHAT COST?! I ain't doin that sober again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: makes my skin smooth but then i break out.
customer_reviews.text: i have combination skin so that may be why, but when i use this, i break out the next day. my skin is ridiculously smooth the day i use it but i guess my skin doesn’t like it after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Kayden

customer_reviews.title: Its my party and I'll cry if i want to!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is does a great job making your skin smooth, I think because it takes everything off ,dead skin,hair and almost my skin too! It's tough to get off , my boyfriend saw me and he knew the struggle was real! Lol! He asked me if I was using Flex seal on my face LMAO!! It may have had the same effect! Like I said your skin will be smooth but you may cry a little getting there! Good luck !
customer_reviews.author: MLS

customer_reviews.title: Not great for sensitive faces
customer_reviews.text: Becareful for those who has sensitive skin , it can cause irritation and acne on the face, I broke out because of these, and they didn’t really get much of the black head as expected. You do have to apply a thick layer to get a good peeling though, so it’s used a lot in a small bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: This sounds simple to use, I thought I had a thick enough amount on. I was so wrong. I had to scratch it off my face!! I used water & coconut oil to get the residue off. Then my cheeks were flaming hot red from scratching it off. Not so sure I will ever use it again
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hays

customer_reviews.title: Steam your face first for better results!
customer_reviews.text: Wowzer! I’ve found that this is best used after steaming your face! After a 5-10 min steam, I apply the mask. I then wait 30 minutes to peel it off. It definitely gets rid of some of the pesky black heads and little zits I can’t pop 🤣. I gave it a 4/5 because no matter how many times I smooth the mask out during application, there always is a little mound of the mask that tries to dry as a lump. Which then makes peeling it off impossible in that area. I need to them wash and really scrub it off as it won’t peel off.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Susan

customer_reviews.title: Works great and leaves pore nice and clean.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I didn't have any type of negative reaction to the chemical composition. I do advice to test a small area and use a light amount otherwise it will take too long to dry off and peeling will be quite.... unpleasant. I put a very thick layer and had that issue, however, a light and even distribution works great. I think the best way to proceed with this product would be using warm and slightly hot damp towel to open up your pore a bit and make removal easier. After the removal, I think using a collagen essence mask would allow your skin to feel more revived and become healthier.
customer_reviews.author: REDXGEAR

customer_reviews.title: Not that great.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't that impressed. It didn't pull much out and still left things in my pores. Even following the application directions.
customer_reviews.author: PunkyBookster

customer_reviews.title: It would have been an excellent product, except I followed the instructions and both ...
customer_reviews.text: It would have been an excellent product, except I followed the instructions and both times I tried this mask feeling it off hurt soooo bad!!!!!!! It felt like I was ripping the flesh off my face and I even cried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I could see myself using it on my problem areas like my chin and nose but never again on my ...
customer_reviews.text: It hurts....a lot. It also says to apply it very thick and it's important that you do because I had trouble finding an "edge" to start peeling from. You definitely won't get many masks out f this bottle if you apply it the way they say. I could see myself using it on my problem areas like my chin and nose but never again on my entire face.
customer_reviews.author: KimS

customer_reviews.title: Apply on thick – not for those with sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Word of advice, for those with sensitive skin – DON'T use this product. Once it dries, it is really tedious (and painful) to remove. You can get the smaller areas with a very warm washcloth. Peeling, though, is painful. You have to apply generously (which means put on thick) in order to peel it off after it dries. It does "clear" the pores. It just ought to, because it is really tough to get off.
customer_reviews.author: KHRider

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smooth skin after using this product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this black mask . It completely cleans your skin out. I bought this for myself to do my face. My daughter was impressed with it now she wants one. Then tonight my whole family did the mask. They couldn’t believe the difference there skin felt afterwards. My son was like wow this made my face really soft and smooth and even cleared up his Acne. Great stuff will be purchases more.would recommend buying the silicone brush to apply. I wish I would have
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Auth

customer_reviews.title: Clean skin
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of little white and black head on my nose. I only use the product for my Tzone area. Apply it and wait for it to dry. Then peel the mask off. I can see my skin becoming more clean and soft after using this mask. The little white stuff comes off from my nose. After this mask I apply a small amount of toner and lotion to close the pores.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana D

customer_reviews.title: OUCH!!! Lost several layers of dermis peeling ...
customer_reviews.text: OUCH!!! Lost several layers of dermis peeling this off. Skin was sore and sensitive after. Haven’t used it again because I’m dreading the pain. Not the product I’d hoped it would be
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic face mask!
customer_reviews.text: This facemask is amazing! It's very tingly but the results are so worth it. Skin is incredibly smooth and fully moisturized and you get a super deep clean. It's absolutely the best facial mask ever, and it's a great price! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: This product did not remove the black heads and white heads from my skin like advertised and do not believe those videos because either those people have skin of steal or tgat is completely fake this stuff hurts to pull off. Not worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Toro

customer_reviews.title: This did not work! Followed directions. Did leave ...
customer_reviews.text: This did not work! Followed directions. Did leave my skin soft probably because it ripped off the top layer of my face. But did not remove blackheads as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Horrible waste of money. I followed the instructions to the letter and then had to leave the product on for an additional 15 minutes and some of it still had not dried (in 55 minutes)! Then the peel.. doesn't peel, it strips away in uneven sections and doesn't hold together. I applied what would be a similar amount to a thick wax layer, after a 15 - 20 minute steam shower to assure my pours were open, clean and dry. I would not recommend this product, either the quality control is not as expected or the product is simply not that good.
customer_reviews.author: jnsnfl

customer_reviews.title: Thicker application is better than thinner.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This stuff works. Hot towel didn’t work out too well, wet or dry, so I splashed some mild hot water onto my face for 3 minutes then padded dry. Then applied the mask on thick. My wife put it on thin and it didn’t work out so well for her. Thicker is better. She is afraid to use it again right now.
customer_reviews.author: Family Account

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask a while ago and most of it is still in it's tube. It was super thick, it took me a while to spread. This mask was terribly painful to remove. I was in tears when I had to peel it off around my cheeks and nose. After removal my skin was itchy and dry. I’m not sure if I had a reaction to the ingredients but I wouldn’t recommend this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Jamelia O

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best for Acne
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like this stuff. It's advertised as a blackhead remover, but all it is does is remove a layer of skin from your face. It's good, if you want to exfoliate, but it didn't seem to help with removing black heads. I used it twice in once week, and my entire face turned red and started peeling like a sun burn, which is why I think it simply removes a layer of skin and not much more. It may have removed some acne blackheads in the process, but nothing significant.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: A mask of fire and tar
customer_reviews.text: I used this mask a total of two times and after each time, my face was red and puffy - so much to the point that I thought I was having an allergic reaction. I ended up having to slather aloe vera on my face to offset the effects this mask had on me. Of all the peeling masks that I’ve used over the years, this was one of the worst. Both the texture and smell are tar-like. Peeling it off felt like I was very close to peeling my own skin off. This is not how a skincare product should be. I’d recommend others go buy a different product, to save themselves the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off, minor pain
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, I like to double it up. Apply some before and some after washing my face. I don't find it to painful to take off and the residue can be rubbed off under warm water. The silicone stick for application works very nicely for spreading and it's easy to clean. Too thin a layer sometimes makes it a bit had to grasp for removal but trulyno complaints. (Reminder, never apply on hair)
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: SO Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and combination skin. This mask seemed to reduce the appearance of blackheads, whiteheads, etc. It did leave me slightly red as pulling it off its no joke. It seems to pull off fine hairs along with the imperfections. But, the redness soon eases and was not caused by any reaction or irritation so far as I could tell. In areas where my skin is dry there was a need to apply moisturizer afterwards, but it does remove dead skin very well and smooth out and firm up the face a bit. It also lasted for well over a dozen full face applications.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This did a great job of both removing black heads but also the peachfuzz hairs. Slightly painful when removed but did what I wanted. I would reccomend and buy again. 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Taleen P

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WONDER BUT DOES HURT!
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared to curse and say ouch! It works wonders on dead skin cells and mild blackheads. Leaves skin super soft and radiant. But be aware, it HURTS LIKE HELL to peel it off. Use only the thinnest layer you can and it will hurt less and still work.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Gesell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We love this stuff. It’s our second buy as it works better than any pore strip and actually gets whiteheads out even if they aren’t already coming out. The larger your pores the more satisfying results will be. I have very sensitive skin but don’t have any issue using this on my nose or chin. Whole face would be a lot and hurt pretty good to peel.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do a thing
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money... It hurts like hell to pull it off. And then when you finally get it off (it does NOT come off in one piece), you look to see what it picked up and it gets nothing. It’s currently taking up space in my cabinet and not being used after it made my skin bleed. Definitely not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mickayla

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on and it was drying before,I could even get smeared over my face,then once I did the best I could applying this super-glue mud, I attempted to peel it off. It was like picking little tiny piece off at a time,leaving my face All red and scratched up. I finally just scrubbed my face with a wash cloth. I don't like scrubbing my Face!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Bentley

customer_reviews.title: CHEMICAL BURN AND DAMAGED FACIAL SKIN
customer_reviews.text: I was exited to try this product so I immediately opened it up and was sure to follow the directions that were included... I am so very upset.. This mask has given me the worst CHEMICAL BURN on my face and for the past 3 days I have had to deal with continued burning and exsesive flaking of my skin. I’ve never experienced anything like this in my life, I cannot recommend this product to anyone ever. Pictures included are over the span of a few days and you can see as it gets gradually worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: Yikes! Will peel your face off. If you like your face stay away and try Biore strips instead. Doesn’t spread well and doesn’t peel off well.
customer_reviews.author: KHMom

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT USE FOR FULL FACE! Unless you like pain. I followed the instructions and did a small test spot on the bridge of my nose. No problem. I go to do my face, and I learned true pain. I waited an extra 10 minutes so it started to crack just to make it easier to take off. As the video shows, it didn’t help.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: I've been getting so frustrated trying to find one that didn't end up drying all bubbly and being a huge waste of time
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a cheapie weak blackhead remover! I've been getting so frustrated trying to find one that didn't end up drying all bubbly and being a huge waste of time, and I read the reviews and decided to give this a shot. It's so worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Mace

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and still am able to use this all the time. I love it and it works so well. It also lasts a long time
customer_reviews.author: Lys

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, fun to peel off.
customer_reviews.text: This mask makes for a fun quick ritual to clear out clogged pores. It is not as effective as an expensive deep purifying mask, but for the price it gives great value. I would recommend using quite a thick layer to be able to coat the face evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: its works - by an unbiased firs time user.
customer_reviews.text: As a first time user, I can definitely say that this products worked for me. I was really hoping for good results and got them. Like, I don't even want to go into detail but, dudes I had no idea that my pores were so clogged. This mask pulled out so many tiny blackheads and pots clogs that I was a bit grossed out. On the plus side, my face looks a lot better and my pores have gone down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Malen

customer_reviews.title: Works well but left scars on nose
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin and my problem areas are around my nose and cheeks which my skin gets very clogged with white and black heads. It works great everywhere on my face EXCEPT on my nose. It literally left scars on my nose every time and was extremely painful. My nose felt very raw and would ooze then have scabbing. It did clear my pores but my nose would be left with scar marks for months
customer_reviews.author: Aja

customer_reviews.title: Harmed my skin long term
customer_reviews.text: I used this product twice, over 3 months ago. aThe areas around my nose and T zone had no problems prior to use, i just wanted to get rid of some blackheads. My skin has become red, dry, peely, and scaley ever since and no amount of toner or moisturizer has helped. This product made my skin patchy and discolored in places were i usually have no issues. really disappointed because of all hte good reviews ):
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order. I have previously purchased this and loved it. This time, the consistency is different. It is harder to spread across your face. It takes a lot of work to squeeze the mask out of the bottle. It seems to be not as much charcoal as it previously had. It takes a lot more product to apply to your entire face. This only lasts about 2- 3 times whereas I was previously able to use this for a whole month.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but the tweezers were worth the full cost
customer_reviews.text: I bought some needle nose tweezers in addition to this set and ended up using the one from this set more then the other set. The mask works pretty well but like most masks, you need to put it on a little thicker then they suggest or else you can't peel it off. I put it on thin and ended up having to scratch it off.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: WOW this stuff is terrible
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was so sticky it was impossible to spread much less clean off. It made such a mess that it took an hour to clean up. I felt like I was spiderman with stretchy black goop all over my hands. Never again...
customer_reviews.author: Nechdm

customer_reviews.title: Works but painful to remove
customer_reviews.text: It works...but beware that it hurts to remove it! I have a high tolerance for pain but removing it from my cheeks was painful and literally had tears...I gave up after sucking it up for a bit and simply just washed it off; the only area that it doesn’t hurt as much is my nose (so I’ll be using it just for that)
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: Not for Acne Prone Skin
customer_reviews.text: Seems a bit harsh on the skin. I am acne prone and the day after I used it, I completely broke out in every area on my face. The bumps and pimples did not clear up for about 4 days and I followed the directions. Have not used it since. Would not recommend for those who have sensitive or acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Sabotin

customer_reviews.title: don’t waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: doesn’t work. too hard to peel off face. go buy other brands that are better. wasted my time and money
customer_reviews.author: Seth Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin clean and smooth.
customer_reviews.text: I have the worst skin. I have large pores and clogged pores in spite of all the products, scrubbers and fancy soaps. This mask pulls every little bit of gunk out of my skin. Others said it hurt to pull off. I didn't think it hurt more than any other peel off mask. I thought it was normal. Clean up of the sparse bits that didn't peel was easy and you get a neat pair of tweezers that make peeling easy. I love this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: The smell was gagging me & he agreed it did in fact have a horrible smell but it goes away
customer_reviews.text: I applied this to my teenage sons face with a brush. The smell was gagging me & he agreed it did in fact have a horrible smell but it goes away. I don't have problematic skin, but I applied it to whole nose. It does what it said it did, however the after peel did not look like the commercials, which were pretty gross.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste M.

customer_reviews.title: The best Charcoal peel off mask
customer_reviews.text: Such a brilliant peel off mask! My wife loves it! It gave her a smooth skin post application and peel off! She said it wasn't difficult or painful to remove the mask as she let it dry completely. It definitely took more than 25 minutes for the mask to dry because she had applied a thick layer of the mask. It is definitely the best Charcoal mask!
customer_reviews.author: Aurko Ghosh

customer_reviews.title: First time buyer
customer_reviews.text: Love it just little think to put on that was it but when I took off I saw different that quick it’s just burn after took off. Love it found new products need bigger size bottle
customer_reviews.author: Kaila

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Pulls out almost no blackheads. Not even ones near the surface. Not impressed. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is painful to peel off. Easy to use and it works, but it's just too painful.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle T

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this....
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mask that would get rid of my blackheads and bought this.. I do NOT recommend this product. I left it on for 25 minutes and when I started trying to take it off it was super hard and it hurt a lottttttttt. I had to put hot water to try to take the rest off. It left my face super super red and with a tingling feeling my skin feels burned. It did not take off any blackhead just facial hair which is not what i wanted it for. Very bad product I feel like it hurt my face.
customer_reviews.author: jeniffer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible to peel off
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. It’s nearly impossible to peel off. I had to use a wash cloth to get It off. My face was red and blotchy after I finally got It all off. It hurts so bad if you try and peel it off. I love the applicator that comes with It though!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: It's the best
customer_reviews.text: I've used black charcoal masks for years ... many different brands.. some even shipped directly from asia.... this is by far the strongest peel I've ever experienced. It provides exfoliation along with blood stimulation at the surface level. Absolutely wonderful. I will order a case if possible and would love a free tube for this review. I'll post a video next week when I mask again. By far the best ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger H.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my nose to remove blackheads and it works well not great but it does get the job done. Also it leaves the nose feeling super soft as well as your face. I don't recommend using it on your face as much because it really hurts. The application itself is kind of gooey and sticky but its not bad at all for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS LIKE A CHARM...IF YOU HAVE BLACK HEADS OR WHITE HEADS
customer_reviews.text: BUT IF YOU HAVE SENSITIVE SKIN ...TAKE IT OFF SLOWLY AND PULL IN THE RIGHT DIRECTION AS INDICATED...I LOOKED LIKE I HAD A SUNBURN OR JUST WORKED OUT.
customer_reviews.author: DAWN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I know I guy but it works easy to use and use to remove . Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: buster c brown

customer_reviews.title: Painful removal and results
customer_reviews.text: Painful removal! A patch was tried to test reaction to the product, but it did not accurately demonstrate what it really did to the skin. After applying the full mask, waiting 20 or so minutes, there was excruciating pain removing it! The skin became increasingly red and hot to the touch. I don’t recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, just make sure you follow the directions
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just make sure you follow the directions. Makensurenyou open your pores one way or another. Also, be patient and wait the full 20-30 minutes. Didn't get all the black heads but worked way better than the strips any day!!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Ipps

customer_reviews.title: Smells strong
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t pull out as much as I anticipated but still works fairly good. Biggest complaint is the smell. I felt like I was holding findernail polish under my nose the entire time I had the mask on.
customer_reviews.author: Randmom

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad....
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not for sensitive skin. It was super painful to peel off and I got red bumps all over my face. The reason I give 4 stars is because it works great for blackheads. I would recommend applying on the nose and and maybe chin because that's where the blackheads usually are.
customer_reviews.author: Farida Shakir

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend to anyone...
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t recommend this product! Followed all directions/recommendations, however was hard to spread around, extremely difficult to remove/peel off, and my skin didn’t feel or appear any cleaner than it was prior to the application of the product! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: koi

customer_reviews.title: Great for Clearing Up Blackheads.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to spread. Follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: F. Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Maybe
customer_reviews.text: Great product, idk if it’s me or what but after a certain time it appears as if it works differently! Does not have the same effects!
customer_reviews.author: Ahoey

customer_reviews.title: didn't do that good of a job
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting so much more out of this, it mainly just pulled out the tiny hairs on my face but didn't get into my pores, the aztec clay one does so much better
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! Everything seemed fine until I peeled it off. My skin looks like I just spent a whole day out in the sun and feels like it too. I even did a test patch on my forehead, but the rest of my face reacted much worse.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Worth it once, not so sold I’d get it again though.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. You really have to exfoliate and then steam the heck out of your face for it to be able to get into your pores and do it’s job. Not a very big bottle and you have to use a lot for a thick layer (too thin just flakes and doesn’t pull up any blackheads).
customer_reviews.author: Corban Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, my skin turn red after using it. It doesn’t work. My nose still have a lot of black. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Erica Liu

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: While it is a slow removal process, this does work well. It did a wonderful job clearing pores.
customer_reviews.author: Rapunzl1

customer_reviews.title: I should've known better because I have very sensitive skin and my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT USE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN. I should've known better because I have very sensitive skin and my skin tends to be on the dryer side because I apply other acne medications, like benzoyl peroxide. This mask made my skin peel and turn red after one use. Im sure it works great for others, but stay away if your skin if sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Product was bad upon opening new box
customer_reviews.text: Was saving this for a review but when it came time to try it the mask came out like a very sticky rubber. It was so far gone I couldn't even try it. This was right out of a brand new package with the plastic seal still on. Product box or tube was not damaged. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn S.

customer_reviews.title: Your wasting your moneyyyy😱😱😱
customer_reviews.text: Unless u can take pain then u can get it but other than that, I wouldn’t get it because it hurts soooo bad when taking it off, it doesn’t come out all in one only certain pieces come out, and it doesn’t help black heads at all, in fact my face even got worst after using it..... I would buy this
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Will pull all of your hair out
customer_reviews.text: Feels like you're ripping your face off! This really hurt!

customer_reviews.title: This product is a scam! Gives off bad chemical fumes and doesn't even peel
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 0 starts if I could! I used a bit as a test on my cheeks and forehead, and had to remove it from my cheeks as it gave off such bad chemical fumes my eyes started watering. After the rest had dried on my forehead, I couldn't peel it off at all. It just flaked off until I gave up and washed it off. I wound up throwing the (very tiny) bottle away.
customer_reviews.author: Pixel Pixie

customer_reviews.title: but I used it again and put a thin layer and it did not hurt as bad. More blackheads pull halfway out of my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't put a thick layer because you'll pull your skin off lol, but I used it again and put a thin layer and it did not hurt as bad. More blackheads pull halfway out of my skin than stick to the mask though.

customer_reviews.title: Got some blackheads but nothing like I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Pulls out hair more than anything. Got some blackheads but nothing like I had hoped. Over it does work.

customer_reviews.title: ye

customer_reviews.title: impossible to get off
customer_reviews.text: once this mask dries on your face, you practically have to rip off our epidermis to get it off. NOPE.

customer_reviews.title: I won't say that it is not painful. Probably instead of full face I will use ...
customer_reviews.text: If your goal is to get rid of your facial hair and blackheads this what you are looking for. However, I won't say that it is not painful. Probably instead of full face I will use it only in certain areas where I need it. The farthest of your eyes the better. My husband and I did it and we are very satisfied. This product is not for sensitive skin (be aware). My husband's skin is thicker than mine and it didn't end so red but mine did.
customer_reviews.author: Indira Lacombe

customer_reviews.title: Face wax
customer_reviews.text: This mask was so painful. It felt like I had hardened wax all over my face and when I ripped it off it definitely did wax all the hair follicles off my face. It was a lot better at unexpectedly waxing my face than it was as cleaning my pores!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Super strong
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive skin but I love how it deep cleans my pores. I do get a little red afterwards but with my skin it's expected. It's best to use it on people with hella clogged pores to see it's strength.

customer_reviews.text: Smells nice and worked on clogged pour as good as Biore strips. It's very tinny tube, but it's enough for both myself and husband. You shouldn't use this kind of product everyday anyway...

customer_reviews.title: Does it Work?
customer_reviews.text: Well if your looking for pain this is a nice product. It does pull out pimples so I guess that's a plus. 4 stars cause it was funny to watch my wife remove LMAO

customer_reviews.title: it honestly doesnt hurt that bad when you peel off but their def is stinging
customer_reviews.text: My face never felt and looked so clean. it honestly doesnt hurt that bad when you peel off but their def is stinging. The only thing is it took 45 min to dry not the 20-30 thebox said. i was worried about getting a chemical burn leaving it on so long but all was well!!! Totally recommend :)

customer_reviews.text: I would give this no stars if I could. It peeled my skin off on my nose on a small part and peeled a good part of my husbands. I feel like this made my skin worse. I broke out even more & maybe my skin was just scabbing from me peel. I threw it out & would not recommend to anyone.

customer_reviews.text: Burns like hellfire if you catch some of your little blonde baby hairs in the mask...Don't do it!!! Stick with small areas that need it and avoid the more sensitive areas.

customer_reviews.title: Love the product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product they did a amazing job. Everytime I use it it peels all the black heads off my nose. Definitely going to buy more!

product_meta.title: Auperwel Black Mask Blackhead Remover Charcoal Peel Off Mask Deep Cleansing Peel Off Face Mask 2.11 Ounce with 1 Stainless Steel Tweezer (black)
product_meta.description:
Color:blackENOUGH OF THE ANNOYING BLACKHEADS! TAKE A STEP TODAY AND SAY GOODBYE!

Have you tried several blackhead remover masks which have failed? Are you getting frustrated by blackheads, acne, blemishes and other common skin problems? If yes, then you can consider all those problem gone with excellently made Auperwel blackhead remover and deep cleaning face mask. Auperwel Blackhead Remover is the ideal facial mud mask you need in declaring war against blackheads. 
RECOMMEND TO PEOPLE 
1.With an aging facial skin with blemishes and lines. 
2.Who have nose pores and blackheads 
3.Who have pinkish to reddish nose 
4.Who have oily nose 
5.Who use computers regularly and needs protection against the radiation emitted from its screen 
HOW TO USE 
Step 1: Use a hot towel to steam your face for 3-5 minutes. This will help to open your skin pores. 
Step 2: Use brush to apply appropriate amount on nose area. 
Step 3: Wait for 15 minutes till the mask becomes completely dry, and then slowly peel off the mask. 
Step 4: Wash your face with clean water. 
Note: 
1. Auperwel effective Black Mask is NOT recommended for sensitive facial skin. Please test allergic reaction and apply a thin mask on Nose Area/T-zone area before applying on full face. 
2. Due to the strong absorption and pulling ability, you might feel a bit of pain when peeling it off. Do not worry, it is normal. 
3. Keep away from reach of children. 
4.Please avoid broken or wounded skin. 
100% Satisfaction Guarantee: 
We have 30-days guaranteed with a replacement or full refund, here is a no risk purchase for Auperwel’s high class blackhead mask. 
Package: 
1* Auperwel black mask
feature_bullets: Note: This effective Black Mask is NOT recommended for sensitive facial skin. Please try to apply a thin and continuous mask layer on nose area/T-zone area before applying to full face. For better peeling off result, do NOT apply thick layer. MAKE SKIN HEALTH & BRIGHT: Activated charcoal blackhead peel-off mask will remove blackheads, whiteheads, acne and keep your face smoother and tender.

Auperwel Black mask with brush: The blackhead mask with brush kit is very useful, a money saving kit without making your finger dirty. You can control the thickness of black mask layer easily by brush,and the black mask can be applied on face evenly and continuously.

SHRINK AND SMOOTH SKIN: The facial mask is made of Pure and Natural formula. Water, Activated Bamboo Charcoal, Rosemary Extract, Avena Sativa Extract, Curacao Aloe Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana, Butylene Glycol, Ethanol, Phenoxyethanol, Glycein, Citrus Paradisi, Panthenol, Fragrance Celliose Gum, Zinc Gluconate etc.

SUITABLE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: The Black face mask effectively clean the blackheads and oil spots on the face and suitable for men and women use. Blackhead mask helps exfoliate away dulling skin cells for softness and clarity.

For Best Results: Black peel off mask could cleanse your skin, please use hot towel OR steam the face to open pores before using the mask. Please peel off mask when it complete dry. If it didn't dry, it won't remove blackhead.
